npcGen.confirmCloseDesc: Do you want to save before closing?
npcGen.settingsHint: Opens a json editor that allows you to add your own entries to the generator. Double click on a tab for an example. Or see examples.md on the github for more info.
npcGen.resetHint: Resets current view to it's default value.
npcGen.defaultHint: Toggles between using default data on top of custom data or custom data only.
npcGen.saveCharacterHint: Makes the generator save NPCs as a PC instead of NPC. Might improve compatibility.
npcGen.forceFirstName: Force first names from this race to be used
npcGen.forceLastName: Force last names from this race to be used
npcGen.amountToGen: Are you sure you want to create %n npcs?
npcGen.uiError: Generating large numbers of NPCs can damage your world, this function is limited to 64 NPCs at a time
npcGen.consoleError: Generating large numbers of NPCs can damage your world ðŸ’£ðŸ’¥ðŸ’€, by default this function is limited to 64 NPCs at a time
npcGen.exportHint: Copy or paste all NPC Generator settings
npcGen.roleSpecificImagesHint: Allows to supply role specific image paths if enabled
